channel.title: Sever already in use?
channel.description:
So apparently the source wont run, 'server already in use'. Now I did look around, and Google looking for the issue, Utorrent and No-IP are closed, NETGEAR is port-forwarded, and I've also checked my ports use with cports and netstat, witch is the same shit. Aslo, Before I entered my No-IP into the Server.java, the server would run fine with localhost as the IP.
I would appreciate the help, thanks.

item.title: Sever already in use?
item.dc:creator: @Ryan2g Ryan2g
item.description:
@Ryan2g wrote:

That’s was i’m trying to explain… Cports is a program witch tells you, your computers running ports, and no ports are running on 43594.
I also used Netstat in command prompt witch also does the same thing, No programs on my computer are using port 43594.

Also, I change the ports on the Server.java, to anything… and it still says server in use.
The server would go online with the Localhost - 0.0.0.0 or 127.0.0.1
as soon as I changed it to my No-IP it went to server already in use.

Read full topic

item.title: Sever already in use?
item.dc:creator: @CPUsquad CPUsquad
item.description:
@CPUsquad wrote:

You have something running on your computer with the same port as the server … check the server port and then check your computer for running ports … close out that application (google how to do it :P)

Read full topic
